com.thegongoliers.output.interfaces

Interface ClimberInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Stoppable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Climber

    public interface ClimberInterface
extends Stoppable
    Represents a climber to be used by a robot to climb up on obstacle.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getPosition()
      Get the position of the climbing mechanism from 0 to 1 inclusive along its track where 0 is the bottom, and 1 is the top
      boolean isAtBottom()
      Determine if the climbing mechanism is at the bottom
      boolean isAtTop()
      Determine if the climbing mechanism is at the top
      void up(double speed)
      Climb up at the given speed

      • Methods inherited from interface com.thegongoliers.output.interfaces.Stoppable

        stop

    • Method Detail

      • up

        void up(double speed)
        Climb up at the given speed
        Parameters:
        speed - The speed of the lifting mechanism from 0 to 1 inclusive

      • isAtBottom

        boolean isAtBottom()
        Determine if the climbing mechanism is at the bottom
        Returns:
        True if the climbing mechanism is at the absolute bottom, false otherwise

      • isAtTop

        boolean isAtTop()
        Determine if the climbing mechanism is at the top
        Returns:
        True if the climbing mechanism is at the absolute top, false otherwise

      • getPosition

        double getPosition()
        Get the position of the climbing mechanism from 0 to 1 inclusive along its track where 0 is the bottom, and 1 is the top
        Returns:
        The position of the climbing mechanism
